description: This file defines the main React application component 'App' which manages state, handles submission of code review requests, and composes various UI components such as Header, ReviewForm, FeaturesSection, and Footer.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React functional component that manages application state, handles code review submission, and renders the UI.

methods.name: handleReviewSubmit
methods.description: Asynchronous function that simulates an API call to perform code review and updates loading state accordingly.

methods.name: handleBackToForm
methods.description: Function to reset view back to the form, clearing code review data.
